name: Too Many Cracks
description:
Space junk has collided with the shuttle. Help Mary the astronaut to find and fix the cracks in the space station. Hurry up! The ship is running out of oxygen.

The spawn of character and cracks are random, so each level  so each level you play will be different each time you play it.

This game has been developed in three days for a Ludum Dare Jam, by a team of four developers:

  • Main Programmer:
    • Gregorio Carvajal Expósito  https://hackbeam.itch.io
  • Main Artist:
    • Imanol Pina Nogales  https://imanolpina.itch.io
  • Sound effects & Art support: 
    • Elías Marín Fernández   (tw @jemarin35) https://cuspyg.itch.io
  • Game Desing:
    • Pablo Casar García   (tw @makinacasar) https://pablocg.itch.io

Music from https://opengameart.org , Trevor Lentz (Levels) & Max Stack (Menu).
